data.comment: In the minute -1, Today's match is followed by 3000 spectators.
The match is underway. Ufa have kicked-off.
Throw-in Ufa.
In the minute 1, Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Tula, Daniil Khlusevich of Arsenal Tula is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 5, Arsenal Tula drives forward and Goran Causic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Tula Arsenal Tula's Yevgeni Lutsenko is caught offside.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Ufa's half.
In the minute 7, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Ufa.
Arsenal Tula pushes forward through Sergey Tkachyov, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
In the minute 14, In Tula Ufa drive forward through Azer Aliev. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 15, Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Ufa.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Daniil Lesovoy.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Ufa's half.
Sergey Tkachyov for Arsenal Tula drives towards goal at Arsenal Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 19, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the home team a throw-in.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Ufa a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Yevgeni Lutsenko gets his shot on target but fails to score for Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 22, Arsenal Tula's Valeri Gromyko gets in a shot on goal at Arsenal Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick Ufa.
Gia Grigalava (Arsenal Tula) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 25, Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the home team a throw-in.
Artem Golubev (Ufa) has received a yellow card from Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 26, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Goal! Yevgeni Lutsenko heads Arsenal Tula into a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Kings Kangwa.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Ufa to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Aleksandr Sukhov for Ufa is whistled offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Tula.
In the minute 31, Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tula.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Ufa.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a throw-in for Arsenal Tula, close to Ufa's area.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Ufa's half.
In the minute 41, Kings Kangwa (Arsenal Tula) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ufa's Timur Zhamaletdinov has run offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 43, Goran Causic of Arsenal Tula gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Ufa at Arsenal Stadium.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Vyacheslav Krotov is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 45, Great play from Ionut Nedelcearu to set up the goal.
Vyacheslav Krotov is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Arsenal Tula kick-off.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Daniil Lesovoy with Igor Gorbatenko.
Ufa make their first substitution with Lovro Bizjak replacing Vyacheslav Krotov.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 50, Igor Gorbatenko (Arsenal Tula) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In the minute 51, Igor Gorbatenko of Arsenal Tula is pulled up for offside.
Ufa's Kirill Folmer is whistled for offside at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 52, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Arsenal Tula's Daniil Khlusevich has been booked in Tula.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Ufa take a 1-2 lead thanks to Artem Golubev.
In the minute 54, Lovro Bizjak with an assist there.
Catalin Carp for Ufa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tula.
In the minute 55, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Arsenal Tula's half?
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
In the minute 59, In Tula Ufa attack through Artem Golubev. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 59, Kings Kangwa is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Ufa throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
In the minute 60, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Penalty! Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin points to the spot, great chance for Ufa...
In the minute 62, Robert Bauer for Arsenal Tula has been booked by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin and receives a first yellow card.
Lovro Bizjak nets and Ufa extend their lead to 1-3. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
In the minute 64, In Tula a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bojan Jokic (Ufa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Yuri Kovalev is on a sub for Daniil Khlusevich for Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 65, Evans Kangwa is on a sub for Sergey Tkachyov for Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Igor Gorbatenko (Arsenal Tula) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 70, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Pavel Alikin is replacing Bojan Jokic for the away team.
Goal! Kings Kangwa pulls one back for Arsenal Tula to make it 2-3.
In the minute 72, Yuri Kovalev instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, Ufa needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team have replaced Kirill Folmer with Danila Emelyanov. This is the third substitution made today by Vadim Evseev.
Can Arsenal Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 76, Vadim Evseev (Ufa) is making a fourth substitution, with Nikolay Giorgobyani replacing Timur Zhamaletdinov.
In the minute 78, Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Ufa.
At Arsenal Stadium, Evans Kangwa has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 79, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Ufa.
Throw-in Ufa.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 83, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Ufa's half.
Danila Emelyanov for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 85, Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
He's off! Kings Kangwa is shown a second yellow card.
In Tula a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 87, Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vladislav Panteleyev is replacing Valeri Gromyko for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 89, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin waits before resuming play because Lovro Bizjak for Ufa is still down.
The away team has substituted Lovro Bizjak with Igor Bezdenezhnykh. Vadim Evseev is thus making his fifth change.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Free kick Ufa.
In Tula a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ufa drive forward but Artem Golubev is judged offside.
Goal kick for Ufa at Arsenal Stadium.
Arsenal Tula's Yevgeni Lutsenko misses with an attempt on goal.
That's full-time at Arsenal Stadium. The final score is 2-3.
Maksim Belyaev (Arsenal Tula) has received a first yellow card.
Arsenal Tula's Evans Kangwa has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
